Pre-Game Insights: Reigning World Cup champion Argentina takes on Guatemala in a soccer friendly on Friday.
With the 2024 Copa America less than a week away, Argentina prepares to defend its trophy at the event with a soccer friendly matchup against Guatemala.
The reigning World Cup and Copa America champion will have a lot of expectations this summer to repeat as Lionel Messi remains in lead of the country.
This will be Argentina’s final friendly ahead of the high-stakes Copa America, which begins next Thursday, June 20, 2024.
Argentina has won its last four matches in a row, most recently defeating Ecuador 1-0 thanks to an Angel Di Maria goal in the 40th minute to secure the victory.

Guatemala, meanwhile, is likewise undefeated in its last four matches, defeating the British Virgin Islands most recently 3-0, defeating Dominica 6-0 prior to that and drawing 1-1 with Guatemala and 0-0 with Venezuela.
